title: Can we please turn morganas snare into a nidalee spear?
body:
given the fact that this ability rewards a free kill on anyone it hits in a teamfight it shouldn't be that easy to land

fuck this champion

just played a game against a {{champion:69}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:50}} 

the second you get hit by any cc you lose the teamfight

10/10 healthy gameplay

replies.body: but the longer it travels the longer the snare, 2.5 sec at point blank and 4 seconds at max range
Morgana has no other reliable damage in her kit. No.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fyAkdwMu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-03T22:27:03.841+0000)
>
> Morgana has no other reliable damage in her kit. No.

everything in her kit besides black shield does absurd damage if shes built ap

> [{quoted}](name=Numb3rs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fyAkdwMu,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-01-03T22:30:09.240+0000)
>
> everything in her kit besides black shield does absurd damage if shes built ap

Yes, but none of it is reliable. Enemies can walk out of W before it hits the 3rd tic to proc Thunderlords. R requires her to be in extremely close proximity to enemies in order to activate, and even then, half the damage is tied to whether or not they didn't run away from you.

Nidalee, meanwhile, can chuck spears at you, but also rush in on you and turn into a cat and eat your face. Nidalee had so many more avenues to deal damage than Morgana does and plus she has heals and escapes on top of that.
You're right, I'd love for it to slip through minions.
My only problem with Morgana is black shield, way too op.
why do u think i always ban her. not to mention black shield is bs
